metadata.description: Koh Fujimura's world is turned upside down when he’s involved in a car accident that leaves his eyes seriously injured. He regains his eyesight after surgery, but also seems to have gained an ability to sense strange apparitions around him… Meanwhile, a serial killer with a disturbing fondness for eyeballs is on the loose in Tokyo, with a band of intriguing beauties in hot pursuit. From the author of Cage of Eden comes a new story of danger, suspense, and superhuman powers.
metadata.name: DEATHTOPIA
